product_description: Bottle gourd is low in calories, high in water, and great for digestion and heart health.
Broccoli is rich in vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants—great for immunity and overall health.
Capsicum is rich in vitamins A and C, adds flavor and color, and supports immune health.
Carrots are rich in vitamin A, support eye health, boost immunity, and add natural sweetness.
Peppers are rich in vitamins A and C, boost immunity, aid digestion, and add vibrant flavor
Coriander is rich in antioxidants, aids digestion, and adds fresh flavor to many dishes.
Eggplant is rich in fiber and antioxidants, supports heart health, and adds flavor to many dishes.
Figs are rich in fiber, antioxidants, and natural sugars—great for digestion and overall wellness.
Ladyfinger (okra) is rich in fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants—great for digestion and heart health.
Mushrooms are low in calories, rich in antioxidants, and boost immunity and overall health.
Peas are rich in protein, fiber, and vitamins, supporting energy, digestion, and overall health.
Potatoes are rich in carbohydrates, fiber, and vitamin C—great for energy and overall nutrition.
Pumpkin is rich in vitamins A and C, antioxidants, and fiber, supporting immunity and digestion.
Spinach is packed with iron, vitamins, and antioxidants, promoting healthy blood and strong immunity.
Tomatoes are rich in vitamins C and K, antioxidants, and support heart health and skin vitality.
